column1: 🚨LIVE TV ALERT!  Joining @foxnews live with @danaperino at 2:10PM.  I’ll be discussing the latest on COVID relief negotiations and the importance of Republicans keeping the Senate majority with two big wins in Georgia.   Tune in!
I misspoke this morning in my @foxnews interview. I was tested yesterday for COVID and tested NEGATIVE.

The @WHO was complicit in Communist China’s cover up of the early spread of the #Coronavirus. Meanwhile @JoeBiden called @realDonaldTrump’s decision to ban travel from China “xenophobic.”   Biden is soft on China and wants to give taxpayer $$ to organizations they control. https://t.co/NUdmW0ulJn

Democrats are so desperate to blame President Trump that they’re now DEFENDING Communist China.   China and the @WHO lied to the world about the spread of #Coronavirus which came from the Hubei province. We need to investigate and cut off taxpayer funding to the WHO. https://t.co/OkjxEgN62u
Yesterday I joined @charliekirk11 on his podcast to talk about the #Coronavirus the stimulus bill China and much more.   Take a listen!   https://t.co/celdbzq3nm
